## useClaimNFT() function

Claim NFTs from an NFT Drop program

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useClaimNFT } from "@thirdweb-dev/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const program = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { mutateAsync: claim, isLoading, error } = useClaimNFT(program);

  return <button onClick={() => claim(1)}>Claim</button>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useClaimNFT(
  program: RequiredParam<NFTDrop>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult<
  string[],
  unknown,
  number,
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                         | Description                                 |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| program   | RequiredParam&lt;NFTDrop&gt; | The NFT Drop program instance to claim from |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult&lt;string\[\], unknown, number, unknown&gt;
